mal:area.comment: Provides a set of services for software management onboard of a spacecraft. The Memory Management service is a low-level service intended to be used to load, dump and check memory addresses. The Software Images service is intended to manage Software Images and Software Patches by allowing the generation of new Software Images from a patch. The Package Management service allows the management of software packages on modern operating systems using the concept of packages. The Apps Launcher service allows the management of runnable applications in a system.
mal:area.name: SoftwareManagement

mal:service.comment: The Memory Management service provides the ability to load, dump and check binary data blocks in known memory addresses from/to a certain memory device.
mal:service.name: MemoryManagement
mal:service.mal:documentation:
The Memory Management service shall provide:
  1. the capability for loading an on-board's memory device;
  2. the capability for dumping data from an on-board's memory device and aborting it;
  3. the capability for checking an on-board's memory device.

mal:submitIP.comment: The loadMemory operation allows a consumer to submit a block of data to a provider for loading the memory of the selected device. The operation shall use the Activity Tracking to report on the progress of the activity.
mal:submitIP.name: loadMemory

mal:field.comment: The deviceName field shall contain the name of the destination device. The interpretation of the value is implementation-specific.
mal:field.name: deviceName

mal:field.comment: The base field shall contain the base reference of the memory within the memory block.
mal:field.name: base

mal:field.comment: The dataBlocks field shall contain the memory block data to be loaded.
mal:field.name: dataBlocks

mal:progressIP.comment: The dumpMemory operation allows a consumer to dump memory areas of a selected device from a provider. The dumping process can be aborted by using the identifier provided in the acknowledge phase.
mal:progressIP.name: dumpMemory

mal:field.comment: The deviceName field shall contain the name of the destination device. The interpretation of the value is implementation-specific.
mal:field.name: deviceName

mal:field.comment: The base field shall contain the base reference of the memory within the memory block.
mal:field.name: base

mal:field.comment: The memoryAreas field shall contain the memory areas to be dumped.
mal:field.name: memoryAreas

mal:field.comment: The requestId field shall contain the id of the request.
mal:field.name: requestId

mal:field.comment: The dataBlock field shall contain the memory block data being dumped.
mal:field.name: dataBlock

mal:submitIP.comment: The abortMemoryDump operation allows a consumer to abort on-going dumping processes.
mal:submitIP.name: abortMemoryDump

mal:field.comment: The requestIds field shall contain the request ids to be aborted.
mal:field.name: requestIds

mal:invokeIP.comment: The checkMemory operation allows a consumer to check memory areas of a selected device. The response contains the checksum for the selected checksum algorithm.
mal:invokeIP.name: checkMemory

mal:field.comment: The deviceName field shall contain the name of the destination device. The interpretation of the value is implementation-specific.
mal:field.name: deviceName

mal:field.comment: The memoryAreas field shall contain the memory areas to be dumped.
mal:field.name: base

mal:field.comment: The checkAreas field shall contain the memory areas to be checked.
mal:field.name: checkAreas

mal:field.comment: The checksumAlgorithm field shall contain the checksum algorithm to be used.
mal:field.name: checksumAlgorithm

mal:field.comment: The checksums field shall contain the generated checksums for the selected memory areas.
mal:field.name: checksums

mal:composite.comment: The DataBlock structure holds a block of data.
mal:composite.name: DataBlock

mal:field.name: address

mal:field.comment: The data of the block.
mal:field.name: data

mal:field.name: checksum

mal:composite.comment: The MemoryArea structure holds the description of a memory area.
mal:composite.name: MemoryArea

mal:field.comment: The address of the Memory.
mal:field.name: address

mal:field.comment: The length of the block area.
mal:field.name: length

mal:service.comment: The Software Image service provides the ability to deploy, list, generate, delete, clone and check the integrity of Software Images. This service can be used to manage Software Images on-board of a spacecraft or to manage Software Images in virtual machines that might run on-board of a spacecraft. The service supports the generation of a new Image from a previous baseline Image with an additional delta. This allows patching software Images without the need to transfer the complete new Image.
mal:service.name: SoftwareImage
mal:service.mal:documentation: All on-board application software shall be updatable by the Ground at any time during the mission. On-board application software images shall be stored on-board in non-volatile memory. It shall be possible to add or remove patches to on-board software images stored on-board without the need to reload the entire original image. In presence of any single failure, the remaining non-volatile memory used to store on-board software images shall have enough space to store at least two different versions of the same software. Ground shall be provided with the capability to define in non-volatile memory for each on-board processor the main and redundant location of the software image to be used at the next processor reset / reconfiguration. The process of loading a software image from non-volatile memory to RAM upon boot shall be robust to data corruptions in various parts of the stored image.

mal:invokeIP.comment: The checkImageIntegrity operation allows a consumer to check the integrity of a software image on the provider. The checksum shall be generated from the checksum algorithm selected by the consumer.
mal:invokeIP.name: checkImageIntegrity

mal:field.comment: The imageInstIds shall contain the object instance identifier of the image to be checked.
mal:field.name: imageInstIds

mal:invokeIP.comment: The cloneImage operation allows a consumer to clone a software image on the provider.
mal:invokeIP.name: cloneImage

mal:requestIP.comment: The listImage operation allows a consumer to request the object instance identifiers of the SoftwareImage objects for the existing Images available on the provider.
mal:requestIP.name: listImage

mal:invokeIP.comment: The patchImage operation allows a consumer to generate a new software image on the provider from a previous baseline Image. The operation can use the Activity Tracking service to report the progress of the generation.
mal:invokeIP.name: patchImage

mal:submitIP.comment: The deleteImage operation allows a consumer to delete software images from the provider.
mal:submitIP.name: deleteImage

mal:error.comment: The software image cannot be deleted
mal:error.name: DELETION_FAILED

com:sourceObject.comment: If the Software Image was generated from a patch, then the source object field points to the Patch COM object.

mal:service.comment: The Package Management service provides the ability to install, uninstall, upgrade, list, check packages. The service shall optionally support verification of packages, verification of digital signatures, upgrade software, manage dependencies. Packages can be organized in different categories in order to facilitate the management of software.
mal:service.name: PackageManagement

mal:requestIP.comment: The listPackage operation allows a consumer to list the available packages on the provider.
mal:requestIP.name: listPackage

mal:invokeIP.comment: The install operation allows a consumer to install an application from a package on the provider.
mal:invokeIP.name: install

mal:invokeIP.comment: The uninstall operation allows a consumer to uninstall an application on the provider.
mal:invokeIP.name: uninstall

mal:invokeIP.comment: The upgrade operation allows a consumer to upgrade an application from a package on the provider.
mal:invokeIP.name: upgrade

mal:requestIP.comment: The checkPackageIntegrity operation allows a consumer to check the integrity of a certain package on the provider.
mal:requestIP.name: checkPackageIntegrity

mal:field.comment: The publicKey field shall contain the digital signature public key of the package. If the package is not sign then the field shall be set to null.
mal:field.name: publicKey

mal:requestIP.comment: The listCategories operation allows a consumer to request the existing application categories from the provider.
mal:requestIP.name: listCategories

com:activityUsage.comment: Add the activity tracking for the progress of installation. Also for the Software Image service

mal:service.comment: The Processes service provides the ability to monitor and manage processes running on-board.
mal:service.name: ProcessManagement

mal:field.comment: Add that the PID and the user name shall be passed on the UpdateHeader field.
mal:field.name: processInfo

mal:field.comment: Setting it to zero stops the publishing of the stats.
mal:field.name: rate

mal:composite.comment: It holds the information of a certain process.

mal:field.name: cpuPercentage

mal:field.comment: Percentage of Memory used.

mal:service.comment: The Apps Launcher service provides the ability to monitor the execution, run, stop, kill and list applications software on-board of a spacecraft. The apps can be organized in categories.
mal:service.name: AppsLauncher
mal:service.mal:documentation:
The Apps Launcher service shall provide:
  1. the capability for periodic monitoring of the applications output;
  2. the capability for starting and killing applications;
  3. the capability for stopping applications;
  4. the capability for listing the object instance identifiers for the available apps.

mal:pubsubIP.comment: The monitorExecution operation allows a consumer to subscribe for the application execution output stream.
mal:pubsubIP.name: monitorExecution

mal:field.comment: The outputStream field shall contain a stream of characters corresponding to the output stream of the application. The MAL EntityKey.firstSubKey shall contain the App name. The MAL EntityKey.secondSubKey shall contain the AppDetails object instance identifier. The MAL EntityKey.thirdSubKey shall be NULL. The MAL EntityKey.fourthSubKey shall be NULL. The timestamp of the update shall be the on-board time when the update was published. The publish message shall include the ObjectId of the source link of the update. If no source link is needed then the ObjectId shall be replaced with a NULL.
mal:field.name: outputStream

mal:submitIP.comment: The runApp operation allows a consumer to run an application on the provider. An object instance identifier is returned for further monitoring of the application execution in the monitorExecution operation.
mal:submitIP.name: runApp

mal:field.comment: The appInstIds field contains the list of apps to run.
mal:field.name: appInstIds

mal:errorRef.comment: One or more of the requested apps to run is unknown.

mal:extraInformation.comment: A list of the indexes of the error values shall be contained in the extra information field.

mal:errorRef.comment: One or more of the requested apps is already running.

mal:extraInformation.comment: A list of the indexes of the error values shall be contained in the extra information field.

mal:errorRef.comment: The process of the app could not be started.

mal:extraInformation.comment: A list of the indexes of the error values shall be contained in the extra information field.

mal:submitIP.comment: The killApp operation allows a consumer to kill the execution of an application on the provider in case an application becomes unresponsive.
mal:submitIP.name: killApp

mal:field.comment: The appInstIds field contains the list of apps to be killed.
mal:field.name: appInstIds

mal:errorRef.comment: One or more of the requested apps to be killed is unknown.

mal:extraInformation.comment: A list of the indexes of the error values shall be contained in the extra information field.

mal:errorRef.comment: One or more of the requested apps is not running.

mal:extraInformation.comment: A list of the indexes of the error values shall be contained in the extra information field.

mal:progressIP.comment: The stopApp operation allows a consumer to stop the execution of an application on the provider.
mal:progressIP.name: stopApp

mal:field.comment: The appInstIds field contains the list of apps to stop.
mal:field.name: appInstIds

mal:field.comment: The appClosing field shall contain the object instance identifier of an app. This update shall be sent after the app acknowledges the reception of the command to stop.
mal:field.name: appClosing

mal:requestIP.comment: The listApp operation allows a consumer to request the object instance identifiers of the Apps objects and running status for an app name or for a certain app category.
mal:requestIP.name: listApp

mal:field.comment: The appNames field contains a list of application names.
mal:field.name: appNames

mal:field.comment: The category field contains the category identifier to filter on.
mal:field.name: category

mal:field.comment: The appInstIds field contains a list of apps.
mal:field.name: appInstIds

mal:field.comment: The running field contains a list of boolean values with the information about thte running status of requested apps. The returned lists shall maintain the same order as the submitted list unless the wildcard value was included in the appNames field request.
mal:field.name: running

mal:errorRef.comment: One or more of the requested apps to run is unknown.

mal:extraInformation.comment: A list of the indexes of the error values shall be contained in the extra information field.

mal:composite.comment: The AppDetails structure holds the details of an instance of an app.
mal:composite.name: AppDetails

mal:field.comment: App name. Must not be empty or wildcard value.
mal:field.name: name

mal:field.comment: The description of the app.
mal:field.name: description

mal:field.comment: The version of the app.
mal:field.name: version

mal:field.comment: The category of the app.
mal:field.name: category

mal:field.comment: Controls whether the app runs at startup.
mal:field.name: runAtStartup

mal:field.comment: Current app running state.
mal:field.name: running

mal:field.comment: Additional information that might be implementation-specific.
mal:field.name: extraInfo

com:objects.comment: An App COM object represents an on-board application. The COM object body shall hold the details of the application.

com:events.comment: A StopApp COM event represents a request to stop a certain application. The StopApp COM event related link shall point to the App COM object. The StopApp COM event source link should point to the object that caused it to be created, most likely a COM OperationActivity object. The StopApp COM event shall be generated by the stopApp operation. A Stopping COM event represents an acknowledgement that the application is stopping its execution. The Stopping COM event source link shall point to the StopApp COM event that requested the application to stop or to null if there was no request. The Stopping COM event shall be generated by the application when it is stopping its execution.

com:event.comment: This event is generated upon a request to stop a certain app.
com:event.name: StopApp

com:sourceObject.comment: The source object shall be the CloseApp event.

mal:service.comment: The Heartbeat service provides the ability to periodically publish a heartbeat message. Additionally it is possible to get the period of the beat.
mal:service.name: Heartbeat
mal:service.mal:documentation: //Mention that the first heartbeat will be after the period set and not right upon startup.

mal:pubsubIP.comment: The beat operation allows a provider to periodically send a heartbeat to the consumers.
mal:pubsubIP.name: beat

mal:requestIP.comment: The getPeriod operation allows a consumer to get the period of the provider's heartbeat.
mal:requestIP.name: getPeriod

mal:field.comment: The period field shall hold period of the heartbeat message.
mal:field.name: period
